ï»¿OFFOAL ,W)CUMENTS t- RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the Committee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Credit (Safety Net and Skills Development Project) to the Republic of South Sudan The undersigned Committee constituted under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Association (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal that the Association grant to the Republic of South Sudan a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 14,000,000. The purpose of said credit is to provide access to income opportunities and temporary employment to the poor and vulnerable and put in place building blocks for a social protection system. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to provide such a credit, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the credit are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project for which the proceeds of such credit are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of South Sudan and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of South Sudan. 3. Accordingly, the Committee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said project for such assistance.
